casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Demario Lamont SNEAD. No. 90PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 27, 2015. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for Snead, Demario Lamon. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Snead, Demario Lamont. Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of October 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of October 2015."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 30th day of October 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
